h2_title: Jiao-Loong of Waves Boss Fight and Guides
content: As well as this, it will lunge and swipe at you, and occasionally sidestep or leap up and pounce on you in an attempt to bite you. With all of these attacks, simply dodging or jumping back should be enough to keep you out of harm's way.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Jiao-Loong_of_Waves.md', within the main section titled 'Jiao-Loong of Waves', specifically from the subsection 'Jiao-Loong of Waves Boss Fight and Guides'.
The content is as follows:
As well as this, it will lunge and swipe at you, and occasionally sidestep or leap up and pounce on you in an attempt to bite you. With all of these attacks, simply dodging or jumping back should be enough to keep you out of harm's way.
